snippet: Thursday’s highlights from around the Web include a dazzling video for a forthcoming Google Glass app that shows how the device could augment a live sporting event. Plus, the victim of a well-known hacker and Web provocateur recalls her experience...
abstract: Thursday’s highlights from around the Web include a dazzling video for a forthcoming Google Glass app that shows how the device could augment a live sporting event. Plus, the victim of a well-known hacker and Web provocateur recalls her experience being targeted online.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Glass App Dazzles, and a Hacker Target Speaks Out
